name: v_watch
description: v_watch is hopefully gonna become useful OS Monitor[ing] tool based on Node.js

scripts.start: bash -c " pm2 start index.js " && bash -c " pm2 save "
scripts.setup: powershell -c " Set-ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Scope Process -Force; [System.Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [System.Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol -bor 3072; iex ((New-Object System.Net.WebClient).DownloadString('https://community.chocolatey.org/install.ps1')) " && powershell -c "choco install visualstudio2017buildtools -A "  && bash -c " npm config set msvs_version 2017 "
scripts.preinstall: bash -c " npm install -g pm2 pm2-windows-startup " && bash -c " pm2-startup install " && bash -c " npm install -g node-gyp "
